name: Pandemic Golf
description:
Wouldn't it be great if we could just meet our friends and families without the fear of the current pandemic situation?

Wouldn't it be great if we could just eradicate covid-19 with the help of a golf ball?

Wait. Hold On.

The last question doesn't sound real.

But wouldn't it be fun to play a game that makes this fantasy to reality. After all that's what games are about.

Pandemic Golf is just about to help you do so.

Help the player kill viruses with the help of a golf ball, but don't get caught by them(trust me it's very dangerous ;) ).

Controls 

WASD to move the player

Click and Drag your mouse to shoot the golf ball

You can only shoot the ball when it is close to the player(inside the white circle ingame).

Rules

Yellow virus can be killed by simply hitting it with the golf ball

Red virus is the Delta+ Variant so you need to rebound the golf ball before hitting it in order to kill it.

Known Bugs

1) The golf ball is not intended to collide with the player however this happens only once at the start of the game, so look out for your first shot.
